Row.Text: The Landsknecht is a unit that must be purchased with gold. The Landsknecht is much cheaper than the Pikeman and has a number of bonuses related to pillaging tiles and sacking cities. These units create a cheap army that can provide a nice return on their investment if sent rampaging across enemy territory.[NEWLINE]Requires [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Communes[ENDCOLOR].

This unit is much cheaper than the Pikeman, and can pillage without using any movement points. Receives double [ICON_GOLD] Gold when capturing a city. These units may not be built; they must be purchased through gold. May move immediately after purchase.[NEWLINE]Requires [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Communes[ENDCOLOR].
